text:
Turns out I didn’t need .value.

Is it possible to get repeater item fields this way?
I need to get the stat and text fields from each item.

<@U2H3TT8F2> Hey, I know this is an old post, but I was just trying this for a client and not having any luck. I did ping the CNAME, got the IP, updated the host file, but in the browser I get error 1001 from Cloudflare. Thoughts?
I am honestly not sure Nathan, let me ask around internally as this post from me was “pre” me joining the HS team :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U02162GK9SP> I think this may have been asked before - is there a way to create product folders via the API?
We do have an API client, a list of the supported languages can be found here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview>

Posting an update to this here for anyone else who comes across this:

Cloudflare will throw an error to any request that comes in for a domain that hasn’t passed hostname validation in their system. You can pre-provision an SSL for the domain that is being migrated over by following the steps here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/ssl-and-domain-security-in-HubSpot#pre-provision-your-ssl-certificate>
also, you cant make folders at this time

Hey - is there any documentation on how line items are returned from a deal? for example, when you create multiple quotes which line items are associated with the deal? How is the order of the line items on the deal determined?

<@U7SL518D6>, so is HubSpot going to be fixing this issue because we are using google page insights for tracking updates/improvements, is there anything we can do to get .webp to truly recognized by google page insights

We’re looking into it on our end. The important thing to know is that whether or not Page Speed Insights detects webp has no effect on the actual score you get. The scores are purely based on Core Web Vitals metrics, the recommendations are just recommendations to help you improve the core web vitals scores.
Hi guys, I'm learning HubSpot CMS i just want to ask if there's a video that i can watch to learn it?
